title: Bloomberg Markets: Kaplan on Pepsi's Premium Products Focus
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Kaplan on Pepsi's Premium Products Focus
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Jennifer Kaplan Beverage, Tobacco and Cannabis Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Pepsi earnings and outlook as the company plans to focus on "guilt free products."
